## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` — New feature or capability
- [ ] `fix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `docs` — Documentation only
- [ ] `chore` — Maintenance, config, dependencies
- [ ] `test` — Test additions or modifications
- [ ] `refactor` — Code restructuring (no behavior change)

## Testing

<!-- How were these changes tested? -->

- [ ] Docker image builds successfully
- [ ] Analysis script runs against at least one target repo
- [ ] Comparison script produces expected output

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch is up to date with `main`
- [ ] No secrets or credentials included
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] `.gitignore` updated (if new generated file types introduced)
- [ ] `config.yaml` updated (if new repo or path changes)
- [ ] Dockerfile updated (if new build dependencies needed)
